title: Chapter 1470 - Returning To The Dark And Gold Star Realm
body:
Chapter 1470 - Returning To The Dark And Gold Star Realm

The Immortal Realm really had such a rule.

Once every thirty thousand years, the Central Immortal Court chose a new leader. But before the new leader took the throne, they needed Wang Ye’s approval. Otherwise, they wouldn’t be legitimate, and they wouldn’t be qualified to wield authority over the Central Immortal Court.

This rule had begun with their sixth leader, the Divine Mountain Immortal Sovereign. Over time, it became an ironclad rule!

No one dared to even voice their dissent, let alone defy it!

Take Daoist Master Red Cloud’s ancestor, the Southern Profound Immortal Sovereign. When he assumed authority over the Central Immortal Court, Wang Ye personally put the crown on his head!

“I’m… not worthy?”

Su Yi’s direct, blatant rejection made Qi Nie’s expression darken.

But a moment later, he laughed coldly. “All of that is in the past. Ever since you lost to my master and his allies, that rule has existed in name only! Besides, the Immortal Realm has been suffering the aftereffects of that catastrophe all this time. The world’s order has collapsed, and you’re no more than a reincarnation.
